mapper.select: select count(*) from freeboard where ${column} like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')

select fb_articleNO,writer,fb_title,fb_content, fb_date, fb_views,warning from (select @rownum:=@rownum+1 rnum, tot.* from (select * from freeboard order by fb_articleNO desc) tot, (select @rownum:=0) temp) sub where ${column} like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') and rnum between #{startrow} and #{startrow}+9

select fb_articleNO,writer,fb_title,fb_content, fb_date, fb_views,warning from (select @rownum:=@rownum+1 rnum, tot.* from (select * from freeboard order by fb_articleNO desc) tot, (select @rownum:=0) temp) sub where rnum between #{startrow} and #{startrow}+9
mapper.update: update freeboard set fb_views=fb_views+1 where fb_articleNO=#{fb_articleNO}
mapper.select: select * from today order by today_likes desc limit 3;

select * from ((select group_articleNO as no,user_id as id, user_img as img, group_title as title,group_area as mapinfo,warning as warning,group_date as regdate,0 as likeno, 'g' as type from group1) union (select mate_articleNO as no,user_id as id, user_img as img, mate_title as title,mate_mapinfo as mapinfo,warning as warning,mate_date as regdate,mate_like as likeno, 'm' as type from mate)) temp order by regdate desc limit 6;
mapper.update: update freeboard set fb_likes=fb_likes+1 where fb_articleNo=#{articleNo }
update freeboard set fb_likes=fb_likes-1 where fb_articleNo=#{articleNo }
update freeboard set fb_title=#{fb_title}, fb_content=#{fb_content} where fb_articleNo=#{fb_articleNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from freeboard where writer=#{id}
select * from freeboard where writer=#{id} limit #{startrow}, 10
